summary.Title: Unsolicited application to our Procurement team
summary.JobHeadline: Unsolicited application to our Procurement team
summary.Presentation: At Coop Trading we are always looking for talented new colleagues! Read more about working at Coop Trading below, and do not hesitate to send an unsolicited application.  Who are you?

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Unsolicited application to our Procurement team
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
At Coop Trading we are always looking for talented new colleagues! Read more about working at Coop Trading below, and do not hesitate to send an unsolicited application.


Who are you?

We are particularly looking for individuals with a minimum of 3-5 years of experience in purchasing, but for us, personality is the number one factor. So, if you can see yourself in our personality of being an ambitious, responsible, and passionate game-changers who challenge the status quo through knowledge and cooperation, then you might be a great fit in at Coop Trading. 


Who are we?

Coop Trading’s purpose is to make a better every day through leading Nordic private brands for 27 million Nordic consumers delivering the best quality products at a fair price. Our portfolio encompasses both food and daily non-food items within our private brands: Xtra, Coop, and Änglamark.


Coop Trading represents Coop in Sweden, Denmark, Norway, and SOK in Finland where we are proud to be on every third dinner table in the Nordic homes. On behalf of our four partners, we develop products for our private brands portfolio through innovation, product development, and negotiating Nordic agreements.


Coop Trading is a dynamic, responsible, and ambitious workplace. We are 140 dedicated professionals in Denmark and in Spain, as well as a network of trusted partners across the Nordic region. We work to challenge the status quo delivering the best and most innovative private brand products.


It is a cornerstone in our identity to continuously create and develop our engaging and appreciative work environment, reflecting our dedication to being a truly exceptional workplace.


What we offer:

  • A dynamic international and inclusive workplace culture that cares about your well-being.
  • High influence on products offered to the 27m Nordic consumers.
  • A compelling purpose to create A better everyday through leading Nordic private brands.
  • Opportunities for personal and professional development.
  • Competitive compensation and benefits package.
  • A chance to be part of a team that is shaping the future of private brands in the Nordics.

If you are ready to take the next step in your career and become part of Coop Trading's Procurement team, please send us your CV. If you have any questions, please contact Head of Procurement, Michael Bjunes on +45 2777 2432. 

Place of work: We have just moved to our new premises on Skelbækgade, Vesterbro.


It is a requirement to be able to meet at the office every week; however, it is still possible to work from home a few days a week.

How do we handle your application? Your application will be securely stored in our candidate database for 6 months, where it will be accessible to our managers and People & Culture team

We want to create equal opportunities for everyone and ensure an efficient and fair recruitment process. It is therefore up to you whether you wish to attach an application letter and a photo.

At Coop Trading, we aim to create an Inclusive and diverse environment, and we actively search for qualified candidates regardless of gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, ethnicity, religion, disability or age. You will be part of a diverse and Inclusive company. where we see diversity as a strength.

Coop Trading is developing and sourcing products to make the everyday life better for 27 millon Nordic consumers by leading Nordic private brands: Xtra, Coop, and Anglamark.


Denne jobannonce blev oprindeligt opslået på https://www.ofir.dk/
(Den originale annonce kan ses på: https://www.ofir.dk/showojob?ofirid=3ea3e688)
